item.title: 独家：投资者敦促 Zara 所有者 Inditex 公布完整供应链
item.description: 投资者希望 Zara 的所有者 Inditex 效仿竞争对手 H&M 和 Primark，公布其全部供应商名单，以便更好地评估供应链风险。【原文：Investors want Zara owner Inditex to follow rivals H&M and Primark in making its full list of suppliers public so they can better assess any supply chain risks.】

item.title: 欧洲人工智能人才争夺战白热化
item.description: 大量人工智能（AI）初创企业的涌入使欧洲的技术人才争夺战日趋白热化，谷歌 DeepMind 等公司不得不在支付高额费用或失去该地区最优秀人才之间做出选择。【原文：An influx of artificial intelligence (AI) startups is heating up the battle for technical talent in Europe, leaving companies like Google DeepMind to choose between paying big or losing out on the region's best minds.】

item.title: 乐购和塞恩斯伯里抓住时机，英国杂货业落后者面临艰巨任务
item.description: 随着英国购物者每周都试图进一步压缩开支，超市龙头企业乐购（Tesco）和塞恩斯伯里（Sainsbury's）正利用其强大的财力，从负债累累、难以与之抗衡的竞争对手那里赢得顾客。【原文：As British shoppers try to stretch their spending further each week, supermarket leaders Tesco and Sainsbury's are using their superior financial firepower to win over customers from debt-laden rivals struggling to compete.】

item.title: 早间竞价强调日本央行的积极因素
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 大众退出澳大利亚汽车游说委员会，绿色燃料标准之争愈演愈烈
item.description: 澳大利亚大众汽车公司周一表示，它已退出该国汽车游说团的决策委员会，几天前特斯拉也切断了与该组织的联系，因为这家德国汽车制造商正在远离一场反对新燃料标准的运动。【原文：Volkswagen Australia said on Monday it had quit the policymaking committee at the country's auto lobby, days after Tesla cut ties with the group, as the German carmaker distances itself from a campaign against new fuel standards.】

item.title: 美国的目标是成为印度洋-太平洋地区的 "首选经济伙伴"--雷蒙多
item.description: 美国商务部长吉娜-雷蒙多（Gina Raimondo）将率领一个总统贸易和投资代表团从周一开始访问菲律宾，因为美国希望加强整个地区的经济联系。【原文：U.S. Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo is leading a presidential trade and investment mission to the Philippines starting Monday as the United States looks to fortify economic ties across the region.】

item.title: 麦格理首席执行官：澳大利亚经济正走向 "软着陆
item.description: 麦格理集团（Macquarie Group）首席执行官谢马拉-维克拉马纳亚克（Shemara Wikramanayake）周一表示，澳大利亚经济已为 2024 年降息和长期通胀后的 "软着陆 "做好准备。【原文：Australia's economy is set up for interest rate cuts in 2024 and a "soft landing" after a lengthy period of inflation, Macquarie Group CEO Shemara Wikramanayake said on Monday.】

item.title: 澳航机组飞行员在持续的薪酬纠纷中再次罢工
item.description: 澳大利亚航空飞行员联合会周一表示，澳航旗下网络航空公司（Network Aviation）和澳航联运（QantasLink）的飞行员将在本周举行新一轮罢工，继续要求提高薪酬。【原文：Pilots at Qantas Airways units Network Aviation and QantasLink will conduct a fresh strike this week as they continue to demand for higher pay, the Australian Federation of Air Pilots said on Monday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，中国监管机构要求大型银行加强对万科的支持
item.description: 两位消息人士称，中国监管机构最近与金融机构会面，讨论国家支持的房地产开发商中国万科的问题，要求大型银行加强融资支持，并要求私人债务持有人讨论延长到期日的问题。【原文：Chinese regulators recently met financial institutions to discuss state-backed property developer China Vanke where they asked large banks to enhance financing support and asked private debt holders to discuss maturity extension, two sources said.】

item.title: 油价因中国需求担忧而下跌
item.description: 由于担心中国需求放缓，油价周一延续了上周的跌势，不过围绕中东和俄罗斯的地缘政治风险挥之不去，限制了油价的跌幅。【原文：Oil prices extended last week's losses on Monday on concern about slow demand in China, though lingering geopolitical risk surrounding the Middle East and Russia limited the decline.】

item.title: 押注加息在即，日元上涨；英镑下滑
item.description: 日元兑美元汇率周一走强，因为有迹象表明日本央行将在下周的政策会议上退出负利率，这与美联储将在 6 月降息的预期形成了鲜明对比。【原文：The yen strengthened against the dollar on Monday as signs the Bank of Japan will exit negative interest rates at its policy meeting next week contrasted with expectations for the Federal Reserve to cut rates in June.】

item.title: 韩国监管机构发现中国股票衍生品销售存在不当行为
item.description: 韩国金融市场监督机构周一表示，已发现出售与香港股市指数挂钩的衍生品的金融公司存在不当行为。【原文：South Korea's financial market watchdog said on Monday it has found wrongdoings by financial firms selling derivatives linked to a Hong Kong stock market index.】

item.title: 日本第四季度 GDP 修正为略有扩张，经济避免衰退
item.description: 日本政府周一公布的数据显示，10 月至 12 月日本经济按年率计算比上一季度增长 0.4%，好于最初估计的萎缩 0.4%。【原文：Japan's economy expanded at an annualised clip of 0.4% in October-December from the previous quarter, better than the initial estimate for a 0.4% contraction, government data showed on Monday.】

item.title: 日本国内生产总值数据上修，亚洲股市下跌，日元走强
item.description: 亚洲股市周一跟随华尔街走低，而美元在美国通胀数据公布前显得十分脆弱，美国通胀数据可能会加速或推迟全球降息的开始。【原文：Asian share markets followed Wall Street lower on Monday while the dollar looked vulnerable ahead of a reading on U.S. inflation that could hasten, or delay, the start of global rate cuts.】

item.title: 彭博社称，达美航空预计波音 737 Max 10 可能推迟到 2027 年面世
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周日报道，达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines Inc）预计，由于波音公司面临联邦安全和刑事审查，波音737 Max 10飞机的交付时间将推迟到2027年。【原文：Delta Air Lines Inc expects the deliveries of Boeing Co's 737 Max 10 aircraft to be pushed out to as late as 2027, as the planemaker faces federal safety and criminal reviews, Bloomberg News reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 早间竞购中国的通胀和资本流动浪潮是否正在转向？
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 日本在长期液化天然气供应方面加强对盟友澳大利亚和美国的依赖
item.description: 资源匮乏的日本正在加强从亲密盟友澳大利亚和美国获得液化天然气的长期供应，因为包括俄罗斯在内的供应国的关键合同将于 2030 年代初到期。【原文：Resource-scarce Japan is shoring up long-term supplies of liquefied natural gas from close allies Australia and the United States as key contracts from providers including Russia are set to expire by the early 2030s.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社称，Reddit 的目标是在计划中的首次公开募股中融资 7.48 亿美元
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周日报道，媒体平台 Reddit 及其投资者正寻求在首次公开募股中筹集多达 7.48 亿美元的资金。【原文：Media platform Reddit and its investors are seeking to raise as much as $748 million in its initial public offering, Bloomberg News reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 美洲开发银行批准为投资部门增资 35 亿美元
item.description: 美洲开发银行（IDB）行长伊兰-戈德法恩（Ilan Goldfajn）在周日举行的一次活动上表示，该行批准为其私营部门分支机构美洲开发银行投资部增资 35 亿美元。【原文：The Inter-American Development Bank (IDB) approved a $3.5 billion capital increase for IDB Invest, its private sector arm, the bank's head, Ilan Goldfajn, told an event on Sunday.】

item.title: 英伟达因人工智能使用受版权保护的作品而被作者起诉
item.description: Nvidia 公司（其芯片为人工智能提供动力）被三位作家起诉，称该公司未经许可使用了他们受版权保护的书籍来训练其 NeMo 人工智能平台。【原文：Nvidia , whose chips power artificial intelligence, has been sued by three authors who said it used their copyrighted books without permission to train its NeMo AI platform.】

item.title: 印度血清公司超越 COVID，推出疟疾和登革热新疫苗
item.description: 世界上最大的疫苗生产商印度血清研究所的首席执行官说，该公司已通过重新利用用于生产 COVID-19 疫苗的设备，在未来几年推出疟疾和登革热等疾病疫苗之前加强了生产。【原文：The CEO of the world's biggest vaccine maker, Serum Institute of India, said the company has bolstered its manufacturing ahead of launches over the next few years of shots against diseases like malaria and dengue by repurposing facilities used to make COVID-19 immunizations.】

item.title: 上海振华否认对美国港口构成网络安全风险
item.description: 上海振华重工（ZPMC）周日表示，在美国国会委员会质疑这家中国国有企业为运往美国的起重机所做的工作之后，该公司的起重机不会构成网络安全威胁。【原文：Shanghai Zhenhua Heavy Industries (ZPMC) said on Sunday its cranes do not pose a cybersecurity threat, after U.S. congressional committees questioned the Chinese state-owned company's work on cranes bound for the United States.】

item.title: 阿美石油公司首席执行官认为中国需求健康，期待更多投资
item.description: 沙特阿美首席执行官阿明-纳赛尔（Amin Nasser）周日表示，该石油巨头正在寻找进一步投资中国的机会，他说中国的石油需求强劲且不断增长。【原文：Saudi Aramco Chief Executive Amin Nasser said on Sunday the oil giant was looking at further opportunities to invest in China, where he said oil demand was robust and growing.】

item.title: 尽管利润下降，阿美石油公司仍将红利上调 30% 至 980 亿美元
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯国有石油巨头阿美石油公司（Aramco）提高了股息，尽管由于油价和油量下降，2023 年的净利润下降了 24.7% 至 1,213 亿美元。【原文：Saudi Arabia's state-owned oil giant Aramco boosted its dividend despite net profit falling 24.7% to $121.3 billion in 2023 on lower oil prices and volumes, showing the state's continued reliance on oil revenue as it seeks to diversify.】

item.title: 华尔街巨头云集，金融博物馆寻找安身之所
item.description: 上周，金融业重量级人物齐聚纽约，为失去华尔街标志性地址的金融博物馆筹集资金。【原文：Financial industry heavyweights convened in New York last week to raise funds for a finance museum that has lost its iconic Wall Street address.】

item.title: 汉莎航空空乘人员将于周二和周三罢工
item.description: 汉莎航空机舱乘务员工会号召其成员在周二和周三举行汉莎航空和短途航空公司 CityLine 的罢工，以满足他们对更高薪酬的要求。【原文：Lufthansa's cabin crew union has called on its members to strike at Lufthansa and short-haul carrier CityLine on Tuesday and Wednesday to press their demands for higher pay.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，Kering 和 EssilorLuxottica 可能成为意大利 Marcolin 公司的收购者
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周六报道，古驰（Gucci）的所有者开云集团（Kering）和雷朋（Ray-Ban）的母公司依视路（EssilorLuxottica）是意大利眼镜制造商马科林（Marcolin）的追求者之一。【原文：Gucci-owner Kering and Ray-Ban parent EssilorLuxottica are among the suitors for Italian eyewear manufacturer Marcolin, the Financial Times reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，开云集团（Kering）和依视路集团（EssilorLuxottica）是眼镜制造商 Marcolin 的收购者之一
item.description: 据《金融时报》周六报道，开云集团（Kering）和依视路（EssilorLuxottica）是汤姆-福特（Tom Ford）流行眼镜系列的意大利制造商马科林（Marcolin）的追求者之一。【原文：Kering and EssilorLuxottica are among suitors for Marcolin, the Italian manufacturer of Tom Ford’s popular eyewear line, the Financial Times reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 赣锋锂业称中国锂市场将长期保持上升趋势
item.description: 中国主要的锂电池金属供应商赣锋锂业董事长表示，锂电池金属的价格将长期保持上升趋势，中国的锂产业将从价格稳定中受益。【原文：China's lithium industry would benefit from a stabilisation of prices of the battery metal, which is set for a long-term uptrend, said the chairman of Ganfeng Lithium, a major Chinese supplier of the battery metal.】

item.title: 中国称总体就业压力尚未缓解
item.description: 中国人力资源部部长周六表示，中国仍面临结构性就业问题，就业压力并未缓解，经济增速放缓的中国正准备迎接 2024 年大学毕业生人数再创新高。【原文：China still faces structural employment issues and the pressure on jobs has not eased, the country's human resources minister said on Saturday, as the slowing economy braces for another record number of college graduates in 2024.】
